## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`make dev-clean; make test`)
- [ ] Added or updated test cases for new/changed code
- [ ] Code is documented (docstrings, comments)
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed (`doc/DETAILS.md`)
- [ ] CI checks pass (GitHub Actions)
- [ ] The PR is licensed under GPL 3 or later
